Description: Sandal for the left foot, made of plaited reed and palm leaves and papyrus, toe and ankle straps remain, slightly pointed toe, footguard attached like upper, resin on sole.
Curator's comments: Original photograph AN364140001 taken by Adrianus t'Hooft and copyright assigned to the Museum
Bibliographic references: Veldmeijer 2009b / Studies of ancient Egyptian footwear. Technological aspects. Part XII. Fibre shoes (101, 103, 114, fig.6c)
